'''''The Shimmering Voyage Vol. 2''''' is the Version 2.0 Commemorative [[soundtrack]] album.

It features a total of 57 tracks produced by the [[HOYO-MiX]] team. The album is divided into three discs: ''A Vagrant Breeze'', ''Fantasia of the Isles'', and ''A Turbulent Peregrination.''

The album was first announced on July 2, 2022, during the [[Special Program]] for [[Version 2.8]]. The tracklist was announced on August 12 and the album was released on August 15.<ref>miHoYo BBS: [https://bbs.mihoyo.com/ys/article/27187910 {{zh|《原神》2.0回顾主题OST即将上线}}]</ref>
